roleset.name: to pollinate by means of cross-pollination

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: The application of herbicide would kill off the male-fertile plants , [*-1] leaving a large field of male-sterile plants that [*T*-2] can be cross-pollinated [*-22] [*] to produce hybrid seed .
